data.Name: Sorry Papi Tour: The All Girl Reggaeton Party
data.Description: DOORS: 9:00 PM SHOW: 9:00 PM WHAT TO EXPECT Move over boys, this is for us! THE SORRY PAPI TOUR the first ALL GIRL Reggaeton party, created by women, for women. THIS IS A 21+ EVENT ONLY For women, a party can be a place where they are consistently leered at and harassed? OUR MISSION Our mission at the Sorry Papi Tour is to break down social and cultural barriers to create a space where women can feel safe, transcend self-love and empower each other all without the presence of men WHAT TO EXPECT - Ultimate Girls Night Out! - Themed photo ops - Pink n Pretty Cocktails - Official Sorry Papi Tour merch - LIVE music from your fav female DJs - This is a 21+ event The Sorry Papi Tour is an event for women, by women. If you do not identify as a woman, entry will NOT be guaranteed. Tickets are non-refundable. It is our attempt to empower and celebrate women, not to exclude. Please keep this in mind when completing your purchase. #SORRYPAPI YO PERREO SOLA CON ELLAS
